segments.text: I had to blow my nose .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you have to blow right next to the phone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I heard that . I thought a plane had crashed into your house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will blow my nose sometime for you , and you'll see .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I'll take your word for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought you had an elephant in your house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you say ? I think I've gone deaf .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going into the bathroom to blow my nose . I'll be right back .
segments.speaker: S2
